Unknown.translation: With fragrance of the colourful flowers carried by cool breeze and fruits of different shape, size and taste, birds of various species come and sing songs merrily.

Unknown.translation: Enjoying all these attractions of the rainy season become more fruitful and enjoyable by putting hard work on the meditation of Lord's name as is advised by Satguru. (74)
